meanings.definition: The act of idolizing or worshiping someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her idolizations of famous singers started when she was young.
meanings.sent2: The idolizations of celebrities by the fans can sometimes be overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: His idolizations of superheroes make him believe he can fly.
meanings.sent4: The idolizations of the ancient gods in the stories seemed so distant yet powerful.
meanings.sent5: The idolizations of nature in his paintings brought out the beauty of the world.

meanings.definition: The state of being idolized or admired greatly.
meanings.sent1: The idolizations of the movie star made her feel special.
meanings.sent2: In the world of sports, idolizations of top athletes are common.
meanings.sent3: The idolizations of his pet cat reached new heights when it won a contest.
meanings.sent4: The idolizations of the historical figure were so intense, it felt like he was still alive.
meanings.sent5: The idolizations of the local hero inspired many to follow in his footsteps.
